title.zh: OpenMemory Plus - AI Agent 双层记忆框架
title.en: OpenMemory Plus - AI Agent Dual-Layer Memory Framework

zh: 架构设计
核心开发
测试体系构建
en: Architecture Design
Core Development
Testing Framework

zh: 设计双层记忆架构，跨会话上下文保持率 95%+
实现 ROT 智能过滤（Redundant/Obsolete/Trivial），减少 40% 冗余记忆
构建 Agent 自闭环测试体系，15 项端到端测试全自动化
设计统一 _omp/ 目录结构，支持 4+ IDE Agent 无缝共享
en: Designed dual-layer memory architecture, 95%+ cross-session context retention
Implemented ROT intelligent filtering, 40% redundant memory reduction
Built Agent self-loop testing system, 15 E2E tests fully automated
Designed unified _omp/ directory structure, supporting 4+ IDE Agents

highlights.zh: 解决 AI Agent 跨会话上下文丢失问题，支持 Augment/Cursor/Windsurf/Cline 等主流 IDE
highlights.en: Solves AI Agent cross-session context loss, supports Augment/Cursor/Windsurf/Cline IDEs

title.zh: 磕线 (Betaline) - 独立开发全流程 iOS 应用

zh: 产品设计
UI/UX
iOS 开发
后端开发
AI 模型训练
DevOps
en: Product Design
UI/UX
iOS Development
Backend
AI Training
DevOps

zh: 独立完成全流程开发：产品/UI/前后端/AI/DevOps/运营
设计 VideoMind Chain-of-Roles 工作流（4000+ 行，6 角色），成本 -39%，准确率 92%
训练 YOLO11m 岩点检测 + MobileNet V3 分类器，CoreML 导出实现 300x 加速
构建 Go/Gin 三层架构 + JWT 双令牌轮换 + 8 层中间件
自研 MCP Server（25 个运维工具）实现 AI Agent 远程服务器控制
en: Completed full-stack development independently: Product/UI/Frontend/Backend/AI/DevOps
Designed VideoMind Chain-of-Roles workflow (4000+ lines, 6 roles), 39% cost reduction, 92% accuracy
Trained YOLO11m detection + MobileNet V3 classifier, 300x acceleration with CoreML
Built Go/Gin 3-layer architecture + JWT dual-token rotation + 8-layer middleware
Built custom MCP Server (25 ops tools) for AI Agent remote server control

highlights.zh: 从 0 到 1 独立完成攀岩 iOS 应用，涵盖产品设计、AI 模型训练、DevOps 全流程
highlights.en: Built climbing iOS app from 0 to 1, covering product design, AI training, DevOps

title.zh: 风控审核大模型 AI Agent
title.en: Risk Control AI Agent Review System

zh: 架构设计
核心开发
效果优化
质量监控
en: Architecture Design
Core Development
Effect Optimization
Quality Monitoring

zh: V1→V4 架构演进：朴素 RAG → CBR → Prompt Chaining → Multi-Query + 策略短路
设计 V4 策略短路机制，人脸解封场景识别率从 5-10% 提升至 94.89%
设计 V4 Multi-Query 并行检索策略，CBR 召回率提升 20%，整体覆盖率 50-60%
构建 Langfuse 深度整合工具链 + RAGAS 自动评估 + Badcase 定位
实现分布式高可用审核系统，支撑 2000+ 并发，日均 300+ 单自动结单
en: V1→V4 architecture evolution: Naive RAG → CBR → Prompt Chaining → Multi-Query + Strategy Shortcut
Designed V4 strategy shortcut, face unlock recognition rate improved from 5-10% to 94.89%
Designed V4 Multi-Query parallel retrieval, 20% CBR recall improvement, 50-60% overall coverage
Built Langfuse deep integration + RAGAS auto-evaluation + Badcase localization
Built distributed HA review system, supporting 2000+ concurrency, 300+ daily auto-completions

highlights.zh: 独立设计 V1→V4 架构演进，准确率从 70% 提升至 90%+，节省 2+ 人力/天
highlights.en: Independently designed V1→V4 architecture, accuracy improved from 70% to 90%+

impact: 准确率 70%→90%+，节省 2+ 人力/天

title.zh: 策略全生命周期管理平台

zh: 系统架构设计
前后端开发
项目管理
en: System Architecture Design
Full-stack Development
Project Management

zh: 架构设计 10 亿级画像中台，OLAP ClickHouse + OLTP TDW/MySQL
支持 200+ 标签 5 分钟复杂分析，刷单欺诈 ↓30%，贷款投诉 ↓23%
构建图数据库（20+ 实体，70+ 关系），支持 4 种扩散 + 4 种溯源分析
主导策略质量保障平台，挖掘 228 个低质量策略，误封率 2.4%→0%
修复 PKV 分布式序列化缺陷，写入性能 90k/s→1200w/s（130 倍提升）
en: Designed 10-billion-level portrait platform with OLAP ClickHouse + OLTP TDW/MySQL
Supports 200+ tags 5-min complex analysis, fraud ↓30%, loan complaints ↓23%
Built graph database (20+ entities, 70+ relations), 4 diffusion + 4 traceability analyses
Led strategy quality platform, mined 228 low-quality strategies, false ban rate 2.4%→0%
Fixed PKV distributed serialization bug, write performance 90k/s→1200w/s (130x improvement)

highlights.zh: 整合画像中台、图能力、策略质量保障、特征系统的一站式策略管理平台
highlights.en: One-stop strategy management platform integrating portrait, graph, quality assurance, and features

impact: 10 亿级数据处理，130 倍性能提升

title.zh: 自建应用反作弊治理系统

zh: 项目全生命周期管理
算法设计
流程自动化
en: Full project lifecycle management
Algorithm design
Process automation

zh: 识别违规服务商 820 家、企业 5.2 万家，处理亿级实体数据
实现年化收益近 4000 万（域名 178 万/月 + IP 38 万/月 + Path 30 万/月）
将人工干预减少 80%，构建 30+ 模块端到端自动化决策系统
实现零投诉运营，建立服务商违规条款，妥善处理百余家企业反馈
en: Identified 820 violating service providers, 52,000+ enterprises, processed billion-level data
Achieved ~40M RMB annual revenue (domain 1.78M/month + IP 380K/month + Path 300K/month)
Reduced manual intervention by 80%, built 30+ module E2E automated decision system
Achieved zero-complaint operations, established violation terms, handled 100+ enterprise feedbacks

highlights.zh: 大规模智能检测与自动化治理系统，覆盖 311 万活跃用户
highlights.en: Large-scale intelligent detection and automated governance system covering 3.11M active users

impact: 年化收益 4000 万，人工干预 ↓80%
